name: Let's Roll (itch)
description:
This game was created for the "Game Maker's Toolkit Jam" 2017.

Navigate your way through the environment as a ninja who has the power to shield himself with a bubble that can destroy his enemies!

Music is by Grumble Labs via the Unity Asset store: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/57965

Sound effects are by Bright Shining Star via the Unity Asset Store: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/27280
